name: cherrfy-ecommerce
description: Root project to run admin and api together

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "ADMIN,API,FRONTEND,TAILWIND" -c "cyan,green,magenta,blue" "npm start --prefix admin" "npm run dev --prefix api" "npm start --prefix frontend" "npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./src/input.css -o ./src/index.css --watch"
